title: unable to spoon RxJava
body:
```
Caused by: java.lang.NullPointerException
    at spoon.support.compiler.jdt.JDTTreeBuilder.createType(JDTTreeBuilder.java:946)
    at spoon.support.compiler.jdt.JDTTreeBuilder.visit(JDTTreeBuilder.java:2972)
    at org.eclipse.jdt.internal.compiler.ast.TypeDeclaration.traverse(TypeDeclaration.java:1374)
    at spoon.support.compiler.jdt.JDTTreeBuilder.visit(JDTTreeBuilder.java:2511)
    at org.eclipse.jdt.internal.compiler.ast.QualifiedAllocationExpression.traverse(QualifiedAllocationExpression.java:604)
    at spoon.support.compiler.jdt.JDTTreeBuilder.visit(JDTTreeBuilder.java:2315)
    at org.eclipse.jdt.internal.compiler.ast.MessageSend.traverse(MessageSend.java:1031)
    at org.eclipse.jdt.internal.compiler.ast.Block.traverse(Block.java:139)
    at spoon.support.compiler.jdt.JDTTreeBuilder.visit(JDTTreeBuilder.java:1602)
    at org.eclipse.jdt.internal.compiler.ast.LambdaExpression.traverse(LambdaExpression.java:678)
    at spoon.support.compiler.jdt.JDTTreeBuilder.visit(JDTTreeBuilder.java:2315)
    at org.eclipse.jdt.internal.compiler.ast.MessageSend.traverse(MessageSend.java:1031)
    at spoon.support.compiler.jdt.JDTTreeBuilder.visit(JDTTreeBuilder.java:2219)
    at org.eclipse.jdt.internal.compiler.ast.LocalDeclaration.traverse(LocalDeclaration.java:301)
    at spoon.support.compiler.jdt.JDTTreeBuilder.visit(JDTTreeBuilder.java:2396)
    at org.eclipse.jdt.internal.compiler.ast.MethodDeclaration.traverse(MethodDeclaration.java:327)
    at spoon.support.compiler.jdt.JDTTreeBuilder.visit(JDTTreeBuilder.java:3053)
    at org.eclipse.jdt.internal.compiler.ast.TypeDeclaration.traverse(TypeDeclaration.java:1319)
    at org.eclipse.jdt.internal.compiler.ast.CompilationUnitDeclaration.traverse(CompilationUnitDeclaration.java:748)
    at org.eclipse.jdt.internal.compiler.ast.CompilationUnitDeclaration.traverse(CompilationUnitDeclaration.java:709)
    at spoon.support.compiler.jdt.JDTBasedSpoonCompiler.buildSources(JDTBasedSpoonCompiler.java:227)
    at spoon.support.compiler.jdt.JDTBasedSpoonCompiler.build(JDTBasedSpoonCompiler.java:480)
    at spoon.Launcher.buildModel(Launcher.java:664)
    at spoon.Launcher.run(Launcher.java:616)
    at spoon.SpoonAPI$run$1.call(Unknown Source)
```

As far as I can tell the logging is not granular enough to narrow down the scope of the problem. I'm trying to analyze the [RxJava 2.x sources](https://github.com/ReactiveX/RxJava/tree/2.x) (note the `2.x` branch). Unfortunately there's quite a lot of classes and they are interdependent so I've been unable to find the cause.

I was forced onto 4.4.0-SNAPSHOT as when attempting this with 4.3.0 another error occurred:

```
Caused by: java.lang.RuntimeException: Unknown TypeBinding: class org.eclipse.jdt.internal.compiler.lookup.IntersectionCastTypeBinding capture#776-of ? super T & capture#778-of ? super T
    at spoon.support.compiler.jdt.JDTTreeBuilder$ReferenceBuilder.getTypeReference(JDTTreeBuilder.java:617)
    at spoon.support.compiler.jdt.JDTTreeBuilder$ReferenceBuilder.getTypeReference(JDTTreeBuilder.java:461)
    at spoon.support.compiler.jdt.JDTTreeBuilder.buildCommonPartForCtNewClassAndCtConstructorCall(JDTTreeBuilder.java:1611)
    at spoon.support.compiler.jdt.JDTTreeBuilder.visit(JDTTreeBuilder.java:1592)
    at org.eclipse.jdt.internal.compiler.ast.AllocationExpression.traverse(AllocationExpression.java:657)
    at spoon.support.compiler.jdt.JDTTreeBuilder.visit(JDTTreeBuilder.java:2279)
    at org.eclipse.jdt.internal.compiler.ast.MessageSend.traverse(MessageSend.java:1008)
    at org.eclipse.jdt.internal.compiler.ast.ReturnStatement.traverse(ReturnStatement.java:373)
    at spoon.support.compiler.jdt.JDTTreeBuilder.visit(JDTTreeBuilder.java:2360)
    at org.eclipse.jdt.internal.compiler.ast.MethodDeclaration.traverse(MethodDeclaration.java:317)
    at spoon.support.compiler.jdt.JDTTreeBuilder.visit(JDTTreeBuilder.java:3024)
    at org.eclipse.jdt.internal.compiler.ast.TypeDeclaration.traverse(TypeDeclaration.java:1338)
    at org.eclipse.jdt.internal.compiler.ast.CompilationUnitDeclaration.traverse(CompilationUnitDeclaration.java:748)
    at org.eclipse.jdt.internal.compiler.ast.CompilationUnitDeclaration.traverse(CompilationUnitDeclaration.java:709)
    at spoon.support.compiler.jdt.JDTBasedSpoonCompiler.buildSources(JDTBasedSpoonCompiler.java:247)
    at spoon.support.compiler.jdt.JDTBasedSpoonCompiler.build(JDTBasedSpoonCompiler.java:500)
    at spoon.Launcher.buildModel(Launcher.java:748)
    at spoon.Launcher.run(Launcher.java:700)
    at spoon.SpoonAPI$run$1.call(Unknown Source)
```

Perhaps that provides some insight into what the cause might be.
